long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CUTool - Essential Tools for Developers & Operators

A lightweight browser extension that integrates commonly used tools for operations and development. Perform various conversions and processing operations quickly in your browser without opening websites.

Key Features:
• Timestamp Conversion: Convert between millisecond/second timestamps and datetime, calculate timestamp differences
• JSON Tools: Format, compress, and highlight JSON
• Encoding Tools: URL encode/decode (supporting RFC2396/RFC1738 standards), Base64 encode/decode
• Text Tools: Regex match/replace, text sort/deduplicate/statistics
• Image Tools: Quick access to Image compression, format conversion
• AI Tools: Quick access to common AI platforms

Advantages:
• Clean and intuitive interface
• Chinese/English language support
• Offline support
• Privacy protection with no internet requirement
• Keyboard shortcut support
• Auto-save preferences

Use Cases:
• Development: Timestamp conversion, JSON processing, URL encoding
• Operations: Text processing, regex matching, image handling
• Daily Use: Quick format conversions

No registration required, free to use, make your work more efficient!
